content: Vivacity Health memo dated 11/10/2023 alerts providers about VP403-2H exception policy revisions. Effective 01/2024, reimbursement for experimental spinal stabilization devices requires IRB approval documentation. This impacts 47 ongoing claims including #VH2023-41892. Network adequacy analysis shows only 21% of haulage industry workers have accessible in-network spine care within 100 miles of Hebron, ND.
